titleStmt.title: The speech of His Higness the Lord Protector, to the Parliament, upon his dissolving of the House on Munday last, being the 22. of this instant January; with the grounds and reasons thereof and a declaration to be p[u]blished to all the people in England, Scotland, and Ireland. Also, a declaration of the manner of the Parliaments proceedings immediately before their breaking up; read and assented to by the Members.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
